cause.description:
Since World War II, the U.S. military has occupied large parts of the Okinawan islands. Join this cause and its related facebook group to learn more!
1. The American military abuses Okinawan resources, including Okinawan residents.
2. For the most part, Okinawan resources should be dedicated to non-military pursuits.
cause.mission: peacefully protest the American military presence in Okinawa and push for the American military's eventual re-alignment in the Pacific away from Okinawa.
cause.name: Demilitarize Okinawa
